subject: Re: FW: Contact us (DT Page) needs to updates ASAP

full_threads.body: +15mins to Harvest
@ricaR +15mins Thanks!

Hi Jacqueline,

We have now disabled the store pickup.
Please see the attached.
Hi @joel, can you please help with Jacinta's email below?

Hi Chris,

I hope you're well.

After discussing with Dianna, can we please remove the "store pick up" option completely from the website and automatically apply shipping.

Thank you





Please leave us a review here

Hi Jacqui, 

Confirming the updates are applied to both desktop and mobile versions. If you are seeing the old version on your mobile it's likely a cached version. This will flush out shortly but does vary between mobile devices and carriers. Switching to 'incognito mode' should help as well.

Can you also make sure it's updated to the mobile version aswel 🙏🏼





Please leave us a review Here
+ additional 15 mins added to harvest.

Hi Jacqui, 

Sure thing, confirming your home page has been updated to the example provided. 

Please let us know if there are any further changes.

done updating the homepage banner. please check. ty
https://www.designtiles.com.au/

10mins
Hi @glen can you please tackle this update? any questions, please let me know.

Thank you for updating the email notifications.
Can you please also update the home page banner- I have tried myself but it can't seem to update it. One of your other team members is looking into this.

In the meantime please change it back to the original - photo attached 🙏🏼

Thank you





Please leave us a review Here

Hi Jacinta, 

We also noticed you have a Black Friday banner on your home page. Please let us know if you'd like it removed.
+30 mins added to harvest and closed.

Hi Jacqueline, 

Confirming we have created the email notification to be sent to your customer. Attached is a screenshot of how it appears. 

Please review and let us know if you would like any further updates.

@chris All good now on this one. I have created a confirmation email for this one.

+30mins Thanks!

Hi @joel 

This request relates to the form submissions on https://www.designtiles.com.au/contact/
At present, there is only a message displayed on the page (screenshot attached). 

Can you please create a notification email with the content from the client? Once it is up, I will get Glen or Jaime to help with a logo etc.

Hi Chris,

Can you please set the customer confirmation email to

Thank you for reaching out to Design Tiles. We appreciate your inquiry and will get back to you as soon as possible.
For any urgent inquiries, please contact the office at 02 9567 8971 and speak with one of our friendly staff members today.

How will this email look like to the customer - Can you show me an example?

Thank you

Hi Jacinta, 

Thanks for your time earlier. 

The contact us form on page: https://www.designtiles.com.au/contact/ is set to display the attached message upon submission. 

At present, there does not appear to be an email notification to be sent to the client upon submission. 

Please let us know how you like the customer confirmation to be updated.
